api_list.name: Solve Text
api_list.description: Solve & send the text to a worker to solve it. The text may be a question, math problem, or anything else.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://link-safe-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/solve"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "link-safe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://link-safe-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/solve"

headers = {
